page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT cont.
page.content:
The area, though primarily residential, has seen a development of {employment} in the last 10 years. Aprroximately 5000 people are employed. The largest employers are: 1980 1985
Civil Service H.Q. -- 1434 Overseas Car Manufacturer 245 266 Administration Centre, Gateway Building Society 294 290 Head Office, Lloyds Bank 438 558 Erotherm -- 417 The large increase in staffing at Lloyds Bank is due to the sale of British Telecom shares in 1985. Erotherm employs 11 disabled people. In the area there are 6 state schools, 1 6th Form College, and 1 special school. In Goring there is a Trading Estate of 16 firms employing 483 .
